title: Microsoft’s Bing Chatbot Offers Some Puzzling and Inaccurate Responses
description: The new, A.I.-powered system was released to a small audience a week ago. Microsoft says it is working out its issues.

title: Lyft’s Financial Woes Thrust It Into the Spotlight
description: Lyft recovered from pandemic restrictions slower than Uber, and critics said it lacked the kind of ambitious investments that could distinguish itself from its rival.

title: Tesla Will Open Some Chargers to All Electric Vehicles
description: An agreement with the White House to allow electric cars made by other automakers is part of a broad drive to improve charging and increase sales of battery-powered vehicles.

title: Carmakers Are Pushing Autonomous Tech. This Engineer Wants Limits.
description: Missy Cummings, who spent more than a year at the federal auto safety agency, said that drivers were putting too much trust in systems like Tesla’s Autopilot and that regulators needed to restrict their use.

title: FTX Negotiates for Return of $400 Million From Obscure Hedge Fund
description: The founders of the trading firm Modulo Capital are in talks with FTX about returning the investment that Sam Bankman-Fried made in the fund.

title: A Link Between Hearing Voices and Hearing Your Own Voice
description: An experiment with bone-conduction headphones suggests a way for neuroscientists to better understand some hallucinations.
